I think that's a great idea! A hybrid approach would allow participants to share their favorite eco-friendly tip or habit while still encouraging ongoing engagement and community building. By featuring a few participants each week, you can create a sense of accomplishment and motivation for others to share their own tips and habits.

To make it even more engaging, you could also consider offering a small prize or recognition for the featured participants, such as a badge or a special mention on your social media channels.

Additionally, you could also consider creating a dedicated page on your website or social media channel that showcases all the eco-friendly tips and habits shared during the challenge. This would create a valuable resource for participants and non-participants alike, and would also serve as a testament to the impact of the challenge.

What do you think about offering a prize or recognition for the featured participants? And would you like to create a dedicated page for the challenge?
